wikipedia_page.main: Irene Mary Bewick Ward, Baroness Ward of North Tyneside,  (23 February 1895 – 26 April 1980) was a British Conservative politician. She was a long-serving female Member of Parliament (MP), the longest serving female Conservative MP in history. She later became a life peeress in the House of Lords, and had served a total of 43 years in Parliament.
